Alan,
I agree.  But, I think that Soten-style work was produced by others through the end of the Edo period.  Most of it is poor quality, but some is not. 

Jim



  Jim,
  The work on the tsuba is very good but the shape seems so late, perhaps
  1800-40, I'm puzzled that I have never seen anything by Soten that would
  fill the gap between Soten II and this tsuba, a gap of maybe 50 or more
  years. Do you agree?
  Alan
